fields.name: AssessmentDetailsLink
fields.description: Link to more detailed assessment results data. The response type will be according to the assessmentType field

fields.name: AssessmentType
fields.description: The expected type of assessment contained in the AssessmentDetailsLink

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the regulatory compliance assessment

fields.name: FailedResources
fields.description: The given assessment's related resources count with failed state.

fields.name: PassedResources
fields.description: The given assessment's related resources count with passed state.

fields.name: SkippedResources
fields.description: The given assessment's related resources count with skipped state.

fields.name: State
fields.description: Aggregative state based on the assessment's scanned resources states

fields.name: UnsupportedResources
fields.description: The given assessment's related resources count with unsupported state.
